tweetSentenceList.constTree: (ROOT (S (NP (NP (DT The) (NN fact)) (SBAR (IN that) (S (S (NP (DT this)) (VP (MD will) (VP (VB be) (NP (NP (DT the) (JJ 1st) (NN holiday)) (SBAR (S (VP (VBD spent) (PP (IN without) (NP (PRP$ my) (NN father)))))))))) (CC and) (S (NP (PRP I)) (VP (VBP 'm) (ADJP (RB far) (PP (IN from) (ADJP (JJ sad))))))))) (VP (VBZ is) (SBAR (WHNP (WP what)) (S (NP (PRP I)) (VP (VBP 'm) (ADJP (JJ thankful) (PP (IN for)))))))))
tweetSentenceList.depTree: [is/VBZ nsubj>[fact/NN det>The/DT dep>[holiday/NN mark>that/IN nsubj>this/DT aux>will/MD cop>be/VB det>the/DT amod>1st/JJ acl:relcl>[spent/VBD nmod:without>[father/NN case>without/IN nmod:poss>my/PRP$]] cc>and/CC conj:and>[far/RB nsubj>I/PRP cop>'m/VBP advcl:from>[sad/JJ case>from/IN]]] dep>far/RB] ccomp>[thankful/JJ dobj>what/WP nsubj>I/PRP cop>'m/VBP nmod>for/IN]]
